name: Untitled Chaos Mod!
description:
There isn't really much about this mod, It's just a normal chaos mod where my fans or friends tell me what to add! But now there's an easy mode! so if your not good at hard mods, just play that mode instead! but if your confident, play normal mode!

but anyways, enjoy the mod!

btw: I forgot to say something in the credits so i will say it here! Splintza for baldi model!
